name: VirtualKeypad
0:
”Alexa, tell Virtual Keypad to arm my system.”
”Alexa, tell Virtual Keypad to arm my system home.”
”Alexa, tell Virtual Keypad to arm my system away.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: virtual keypad
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With the Virtual Keypad custom skill you can ask Alexa to arm your DMP connected security system. Here are some examples of commands you can ask Alexa to do...

Arming
- Alexa, tell Virtual Keypad to arm my system.
- Alexa, tell Virtual Keypad to arm my system home.
- Alexa, tell Virtual Keypad to arm my system away.
- Alexa, tell Virtual Keypad to arm my system sleep.
- Alexa, tell Virtual Keypad to arm my system all.
- Alexa, tell Virtual Keypad to arm my system perimeter.
